Title: Daikin’s GHG reduction targets certified as “Net Zero” by SBTi
Summary:
Daikin Industries, Ltd. has received “Net Zero Targets” certification from the Science-based Targets Initiative (SBTi) for its long-term greenhouse gas (GHG) emissions reduction goals.
